identity.sql: SELECT CAST(x AS INT) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS INTEGER) FROM t
identity.expected: SELECT CAST(x AS INT) FROM t

identity.sql: SELECT CAST(x AS BIGINT) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS SMALLINT) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS TINYINT) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS FLOAT) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS DOUBLE) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS BOOLEAN) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS VARCHAR) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS TEXT) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS CHAR) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS DATE) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS TIMESTAMP) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS INTERVAL) FROM t
SELECT CAST(x AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) FROM t
identity.description: CAST to DECIMAL with precision and scale

identity.sql: SELECT CAST(x AS NUMERIC(10, 2)) FROM t
identity.expected: SELECT CAST(x AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) FROM t
identity.description: CAST to NUMERIC with precision and scale

identity.sql: SELECT CAST(x AS VARCHAR(255)) FROM t
SELECT TRY_CAST(x AS INT) FROM t
SELECT TRY_CAST(x AS BIGINT) FROM t
SELECT TRY_CAST(x AS VARCHAR) FROM t
SELECT TRY_CAST(x AS DOUBLE) FROM t
SELECT TRY_CAST(x AS TIMESTAMP) FROM t
SELECT arrow_cast(x, 'Int32') FROM t
SELECT arrow_cast(x, 'Float64') FROM t
SELECT arrow_cast(x, 'Utf8') FROM t
SELECT arrow_typeof(x) FROM t
SELECT x::INT FROM t
identity.expected: SELECT CAST(x AS INT) FROM t

identity.sql: SELECT x::VARCHAR FROM t
identity.expected: SELECT CAST(x AS VARCHAR) FROM t

identity.sql: SELECT CAST(x AS BYTEA) FROM t
identity.expected: SELECT CAST(x AS VARBINARY) FROM t
